name: Rubble Swap
description:
Reach for the stars by jumping and swapping your position with endlessly falling rubble, just make sure you're never in their way!

Base Controls

← → - Change direction

↑ - Jump

Space - Shoot

R - Restart

P, Esc - Pause

Sound effects taken from https://pixabay.com and https://freesound.org

Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P?query=press
